Class WorldView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.app.Application
      • com.jme3.app.SimpleApplication
        • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.views.WorldView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme3.system.SystemListener, java.util.Observer

    public class WorldView
extends com.jme3.app.SimpleApplication
implements java.util.Observer
    This class is a jMonkey canvas that can be added in a Swing GUI.
    Author:
    fhennecker, julianschembri, brochape, Titouan,wmoulart
